author.name: Ben McNelly
author.bio: Founder of Full Bore Studios. Loves fruit and fast code.

content.text: Sucrier is a tiny JavaScript template engine with big flavor. It's ideal for simple projects that need dynamic rendering without heavy frameworks.

content.caption: Sucrier is light, modular, and tasty.

content.text: Inspired by Django and Jinja2, it uses familiar syntax like {{ title }} and {% for item in list %}.
